Tabulatr

A plugin for better tab management

Tabulatr is an extension to help make your browsing experience more efficient. The app prevents you from opening multiple tabs of specific websites at one time without getting in the way of your browsing. If you open a tracked site in two separate tabs, Tabulatr will automatically bring the first tab into view and close the second tab, meaning you will never end the day with a bunch of minimized facebook tabs!

To add a site to Tabulatr, navigate to the site you want Tabulatr to work on, copy the URL, paste it into the field below and hit "Add New Site". If you would like to suggest any sites that should come pre-loaded, please do so here!

For the extension to work properly, please make sure you close duplicate tabs of any site you want Tabluatr to work on - this will ensure that you get the correct behavior.
